title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Product Name: KitchedAid 5 Tilt-Head Stand Mixer

Overview:
Meet the versatile KitchedAid 5, a durable metal stand mixer designed to power through everyday baking and big-batch projects alike. With a 5-quart stainless steel bowl, 10 speeds, and efficient planetary mixing with 59 touch points, it delivers thorough, consistent results whether you’re whipping, kneading, or beating. Available in more than 20 colors to match any kitchen.

Key Features:
- Capacity for more: Mix up to 9 dozen cookies per batch or knead dough for up to 4 loaves of bread. Cookie capacity based on approximately 28 g dough per cookie.
- 5-quart stainless steel bowl: Durable, dishwasher-safe bowl with a comfortable handle for secure grip and easy pouring.
- Powerful, thorough mixing: Planetary mixing action with 59 touch points ensures ingredients are fully incorporated for smooth batters and well-developed doughs.
- Tilt-head design: Provides clear access to the bowl and attachments for quick ingredient additions and hassle-free scraping.
- 10 precise speeds: From gentle stirring to high-speed whipping for a range of recipes and textures.
- Built to last: Sturdy metal construction designed for long-term reliability.
- Color options: Choose from more than 20 finishes to suit your style.
- Expand your creativity: Hub-powered compatibility with 10+ optional attachments (sold separately) for tasks like pasta making, food grinding, spiralizing, and more.

What’s in the Box:
- 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl
- Coated Flat Beater
- Coated Dough Hook
- 6-Wire Whip
- Pouring Shield

Model Details:
- Design: Tilt-head
- Speeds: 10
- Bowl: 5-quart, stainless steel, dishwasher safe, comfortable handle
- Mixing: Planetary action with 59 touch points
- Construction: Metal
- Optional Attachments: More than 10, hub-powered (sold separately)
- Model reference: KSM150PS

Why You’ll Love It:
The KitchedAid 5 balances capacity, control, and convenience for bakers and cooks at every level. It’s large enough for crowd-pleasing batches yet compact for everyday use, with easy-clean components and a timeless design that looks great on your countertop.
